txt.en: 'Meow! Are you already up to Book IV of the Epic quest series? Goodness, so many good quests and adventures. I wish my furry paws let me make content as exciting as that, but I'm just a humble, slow typing cat.\n\nOh well, at least I can help you! Just speak to me again.
'When this quest is completed, you'll be flagged as having completed Book IV of the Epic. Enjoy!'
Completion of this quest will flag your character has having completed all the quests in Book IV of the Epic quest series.
